channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-6131] Allow to configure maven connection/read timeouts
item.description:
It is currently not possible to configure the maven connection and read timeouts in Fabric.
If a repository is unresponsive we may potentially wait for a long time before getting an exception in the form of 

2016-09-19 11:46:28,891 | INFO  | dataResolver-5-0 | RetryExec  | 125 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-621159 | I/O exception (java.net.SocketException) caught when processing request to {s}->https://repo.fusesource.com:443 : Connection timed out

Also, its not clear what the effective timeout values are.
item.summary: Allow to configure maven connection/read timeouts

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
I've allowed to configure timeouts and improved logging. For example, when having:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> config:proplist --pid org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn 
...
 
org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.repositories = \
 
   http://192.0.2.0/repository@id=unavailable, \
 
   http://repo1.maven.org/maven2@id=maven.central.repo, \
 
   https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga@id=redhat.ga.repo

doing:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> install mvn:commons-io/commons-io/2.222
 
Bundle IDs: 
Error executing command: Error installing bundles:
 
	Unable to install bundle mvn:commons-io/commons-io/2.222

I got:

10:59:02,306 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 6 - org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-api - 1.8.5 | Error resolving artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222: [Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to unavailable (http://192.0.2.0/repository/): Connect to 192.0.2.0:80 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out, Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in maven.central.repo (http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/), Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ga.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga/)]

(formatted)

10:59:02,306 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 6 - org.ops4j.pax.logging.pax-logging-api - 1.8.5 | Error resolving artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222: [ \
 
   Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to unavailable (http://192.0.2.0/repository/): Connect to 192.0.2.0:80 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out, \
 
   Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in maven.central.repo (http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/), \
 
   Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ga.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga/) \
 
]

There's improved configuration of org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn and io.fabric8.maven pids:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> config:proplist --pid org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn 
...
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.connection.bufferSize = 8192
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.connection.retryCount = 3
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.socket.connectionTimeout = 5000
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.socket.readTimeout = 5000
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.socket.keepAlive = false
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.socket.linger = -1
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.socket.reuseAddress = false
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.socket.tcpNoDelay = true
 
   org.ops4j.pax.url.mvn.timeout = 5000
 
...

(I'll describe them in separate document)

In fabric mode, using mvn:// protocol provides more information as well:

... | Error resolving artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222
 
... |  - Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to inaccessible (http://192.0.2.0:4000/repo/): Connect to 192.0.2.0:4000 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out
 
... |  - Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to unavailable (http://127.0.0.1:4000/repo/): Connect to 127.0.0.1:4000 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused
 
... |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in maven.central.repo (http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/)
 
... |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ga.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga/)
 
... |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ea.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/earlyaccess/all/)
 
... |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in fuseearlyaccess (https://repository.jboss.org/nexus/content/groups/ea/)

After:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> profile-edit --pid org.ops4j.pax.logging/log4j.logger.io.fabric8.maven.url=DEBUG karaf
 
Setting value:DEBUG key:log4j.logger.io.fabric8.maven.url on pid:org.ops4j.pax.logging and profile:karaf version:1.0

we can see even more information (stack traces for each repository hit):

2016-10-04 11:38:27,942 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 | Error resolving artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222
 
2016-10-04 11:38:27,943 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 |  - Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to inaccessible (http://192.0.2.0:4000/repo/): Connect to 192.0.2.0:4000 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out
 
org.eclipse.aether.transfer.ArtifactTransferException: Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to inaccessible (http://192.0.2.0:4000/repo/): Connect to 192.0.2.0:4000 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.ArtifactTransportListener.transferFailed(ArtifactTransportListener.java:43)
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.BasicRepositoryConnector$TaskRunner.run(BasicRepositoryConnector.java:355)
 
	...

Caused by: org.apache.maven.wagon.TransferFailedException: Connect to 192.0.2.0:4000 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out
 
	at org.apache.maven.wagon.providers.http.AbstractHttpClientWagon.fillInputData(AbstractHttpClientWagon.java:1085)
 
	...
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.BasicRepositoryConnector$TaskRunner.run(BasicRepositoryConnector.java:350)
 
	... 41 more
 
Caused by: org.apache.http.conn.ConnectTimeoutException: Connect to 192.0.2.0:4000 [/192.0.2.0] failed: connect timed out
 
	at org.apache.http.impl.conn.DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.connect(DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.java:150)
 
	...
 
	at org.apache.maven.wagon.providers.http.AbstractHttpClientWagon.fillInputData(AbstractHttpClientWagon.java:1000)
 
	... 50 more
 
Caused by: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out
 
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)[:1.8.0_102]
 
	...
 
	at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:589)[:1.8.0_102]
 
	at org.apache.http.conn.socket.PlainConnectionSocketFactory.connectSocket(PlainConnectionSocketFactory.java:74)
 
	at org.apache.http.impl.conn.DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.connect(DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.java:141)
 
	... 60 more
 
2016-10-04 11:38:27,970 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 |  - Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to unavailable (http://127.0.0.1:4000/repo/): Connect to 127.0.0.1:4000 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused
 
org.eclipse.aether.transfer.ArtifactTransferException: Could not transfer artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 from/to unavailable (http://127.0.0.1:4000/repo/): Connect to 127.0.0.1:4000 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.ArtifactTransportListener.transferFailed(ArtifactTransportListener.java:43)
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.BasicRepositoryConnector$TaskRunner.run(BasicRepositoryConnector.java:355)
 
	...
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.Console.run(Console.java:197)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.DelayedStarted.run(DelayedStarted.java:79)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]
 
Caused by: org.apache.maven.wagon.TransferFailedException: Connect to 127.0.0.1:4000 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused
 
	at org.apache.maven.wagon.providers.http.AbstractHttpClientWagon.fillInputData(AbstractHttpClientWagon.java:1085)
 
    ...
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.BasicRepositoryConnector$TaskRunner.run(BasicRepositoryConnector.java:350)
 
	... 41 more
 
Caused by: org.apache.http.conn.HttpHostConnectException: Connect to 127.0.0.1:4000 [/127.0.0.1] failed: Connection refused
 
	at org.apache.http.impl.conn.DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.connect(DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.java:158)
 
	...
 
	at org.apache.maven.wagon.providers.http.AbstractHttpClientWagon.fillInputData(AbstractHttpClientWagon.java:1000)
 
	... 50 more
 
Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused
 
	at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Native Method)[:1.8.0_102]
 
	...
 
	at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:589)[:1.8.0_102]
 
	at org.apache.http.conn.socket.PlainConnectionSocketFactory.connectSocket(PlainConnectionSocketFactory.java:74)
 
	at org.apache.http.impl.conn.DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.connect(DefaultHttpClientConnectionOperator.java:141)
 
	... 60 more
 
2016-10-04 11:38:27,990 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in maven.central.repo (http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/)
 
org.eclipse.aether.transfer.ArtifactNotFoundException: Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in maven.central.repo (http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/)
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.ArtifactTransportListener.transferFailed(ArtifactTransportListener.java:39)
 
	...
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.Console.run(Console.java:197)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]

2016-10-04 11:38:27,997 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ga.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/ga/)

2016-10-04 11:38:28,007 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ea.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/earlyaccess/all/)
 
org.eclipse.aether.transfer.ArtifactNotFoundException: Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in redhat.ea.repo (https://maven.repository.redhat.com/earlyaccess/all/)
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.ArtifactTransportListener.transferFailed(ArtifactTransportListener.java:39)
 
	...
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.Console.run(Console.java:197)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.DelayedStarted.run(DelayedStarted.java:79)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]
 
2016-10-04 11:38:28,014 | WARN  | l Console Thread | AetherBasedResolver              | 155 - io.fabric8.fabric-maven - 1.2.0.redhat-630193 |  - Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in fuseearlyaccess (https://repository.jboss.org/nexus/content/groups/ea/)
 
org.eclipse.aether.transfer.ArtifactNotFoundException: Could not find artifact commons-io:commons-io:jar:2.222 in fuseearlyaccess (https://repository.jboss.org/nexus/content/groups/ea/)
 
	at org.eclipse.aether.connector.basic.ArtifactTransportListener.transferFailed(ArtifactTransportListener.java:39)
 
	...
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.Console.run(Console.java:197)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]
 
	at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.DelayedStarted.run(DelayedStarted.java:79)[38:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-630193]

we can see exact reasons of all failures:

  • java.net.SocketTimeoutException: connect timed out for http://192.0.2.0:4000/repo/
  • java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused for http://127.0.0.1:4000/repo/
  • org.eclipse.aether.transfer.ArtifactNotFoundException for normal repositories

Resolved in 1.2.0.redhat-6-3-x here.

Expect some update of Fuse/Maven documentation soon.
